io.odysz.anson

Annotation Type AnsonField


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface AnsonField

    Controlling options of (de)serializing Anson fields.

    For reference: see Oracle Docs;

    For Annotation tutorial, see Java Reflection - Annotations.

    Author:
    odys-z@github.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Fields and Description
      static int enclosing 
      static int undefined 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean ignoreFrom 
      boolean ignoreTo 
      int ref 
      boolean shortenString
      If a sting field, e.g.
      String valType
      Specifying array's element type information.

    • Field Detail

      • undefined

        public static final int undefined

      • enclosing

        public static final int enclosing

    • Element Detail

      • ignoreTo

        public abstract boolean ignoreTo
        Default:
        false

      • ignoreFrom

        public abstract boolean ignoreFrom
        Default:
        false

      • valType

        public abstract String valType

        Specifying array's element type information.

        Example:
        for Object[], use
                    @AnsonField(valType="[Ljava.lang.Object;")
           Object[][] f;
        for ArrayList<Object[]>, use 
                    @AnsonField(valType="java.util.ArrayList;[Ljava.lang.Object;"
           ArrayList>
        Default:
        ""

      • shortenString

        public abstract boolean shortenString
        If a sting field, e.g. base64 string come with this, IJsonable.toBlock(JsonOpt) (opt.shortenOnAnnotation = true) will ignore the content.
        - long string printed only for debugging.
        Returns:
        the annotation. If true, use shorten string when possible
        Default:
        false

      • ref

        public abstract int ref
        Default:
        -1
